cleanup.commit_message: sync
Sync and get building
Made requested change to u1022. Added backround layers back in.
Delete backgrounds
More cleanup edits.
Update copyright date
Shortcircuit builds
Added requested Khamti stylistic changes.
Added preglyphs script.
Added requested khamti stylistic changes.
Added preglyphs script. [nobuild]
Continued work on general cleanup. Bumped metadata for copyright year, fixed RFN.
Change destination of rmkeys logs.
Khamti encoding cleanup
Make sure Khamti Book is adequately handled
Bump minor version since we now require khamti to use UVS
Merge khamti work
Add UVS to tests and rename Khamti font
Add UVS for khamti
Rename u1086.kham to u1086.dkham; KHT/N language doesn't use base khamti forms, use VS instead. Remove old build source files, at last.
Fixes issue #16
Add support for .sml glyphs
Added 11 glyphs with the tag .sml, 40% smaller than the .med glyphs
Turn off bake unless --bake for now
Partial fix of issue 9 graphite pwo tone ordering
Shift 103D with 1061
Remove weird interface problem for open in py3. Should be OK in py2, he says fingers crossed
Reorder 1062 1086 in khamti
Add Khamti package
Partial fix of issue 9 graphite pwo tone ordering
Shift 103D with 1061
Added u106F and u1070 to @needsUtall  cleaned up the lookup (fixes issue 16 part B)
Remove weird interface problem for open in py3. Should be OK in py2, he says fingers crossed
created auto-generated WOFF-metadata.xml via preflight; also reconfigured preflight. Updated and corrected FONTLOG.txt and fontinfo.plist so auto-generation works. (issue #14)
Tidying up some of the initial lookups we did - naming is more consistent. There should not be any change in test results.
Reorder 1062 1086 in khamti
Added substitution lookup for new u103C variant shapes; some positioning rules also fix some of the collisions. (issue #4)
Add Khamti package
Revert anchor point position moves
Progress on cleaning up medium characters.
Fixed one tiny class definition casing.
Added missing glyphs (allows grcompiler to finish build). Backported from branch.
Add new chars to classes
Fixed u103c_u103d_wide.
First pass at cleanup, harmonized stroke widths.
Added paremeter for weight-specific output for grcompiler errors.
Dropped unnecessary fields in wscript (bring closer to general template).
Removed done items.
Removed unneeded config file for previous-generation smith.
Both design and build do not use the sfd file any longer, removed them so there is no ambiguity about what source is canonical.
Removed old packaging files (outdated and handled elsewhere already).
Sync-ed copyright statements.
Modified log paths so that all logs end up in the same folder.
Modified version to get it from the UFO directly.
Added requested latin glyphs and symbols for multiscript texts (issue #6).
Add new glyphs to padauk_classes; add OpenType code and a test file for Asho Chin
Added 3 glyphs needed for Asho Chin (issue 8), raised vertical stem on 3 glyphs and shortened three other glyphs to address collision issues (issue 19).
Add the 4 new glyphs to padauk_classes to let the build finish (Graphite was stopping)  NB: Rules for Graphite and OpenType still need to be written for these
Added u103C.open.narr, u103C.open.wide, u103C.alt.open.narr, u103C.alt.open.wide to fix collisions in stacked shaping. (issue #4)
Added glyphs to .gitignore.
Add some tests for github issues
Updating preflightg
Fix merge badness
Merge to use UFO sources and workflow
Fixing anchor position in UFO to match what's in fea
Fixing the position of one anchor in fea to match what's in the UFO
Adding capHeight and xHeight back in after restore; version bump to 3.902
Restoring UFOs with unitsPerEm of 1024
Removing stray anchor
Removing old preflights
Restoring advance widths again
Fix lookup ordering for double vs single attachment
Changing version in wscript
Adding xHeight and capHeight; version bump to 3.901
Removing ufos and designspace that are no longer needed
Changing designspace and preflights to use new masters
Rescaling two main masters from 1024 to 2048
Add AP documentation
Restoring advance widths removed in error
Fixing incompatible outlines
Auto conform BookBold APs to same structure as Regular
First test change to fix interpolation compatibility
First Glyphs import/export; mainly sorting anchors
Removing FontLab hinting data
Fixing paths
Creating interim designspace and preflights for interpolated version
Preparing preflight+preflightg
Preparing lib.plist for use with Glyphs
Tidying up fontinfo
Trivial resort of contents
Making preflight work
Refactor fea file names
Start code refactoring and reduction
Lots of position rules fixing
Get something work OKish. More refinement needed
Add extra regression test
It builds, but is junk
Remove redundant subtable statements

Set up new designspace workflow: modified wscript, renamed PadaukBook .fea files to make it work. *NB:* Designspace file not set up for interpolation yet. Design work needs to be done before that will work (too many fatal errors). Also renamed uniFE00 to uFE00 in Regular for consistency.
Moved ufos to /masters folder and fixed up metadata, added preflight to normalize and sync
Add project dirs to .gitignore
Transfer in adjustment APs. Builds with no functional difference
Merge branch 'preufo' into toufo
Change special values to APs
Fix order classes so not needed at the glyph level
Initial UFO export, missing AP stuff still
Rearrange folder structure to conform to standard for new workflow
Fix no breaks in contextual rule runs
Mark for old make_fea
Now builds using fonttools
Keep using fontforge
Added the buildusingfontforge param.
replaced OFL-FAQ.txt with latest version (1.1-update5)
Modified Graphite and OpenType so Sgaw Karen defaults to round washwe and upright hato (issue #11)
Adjusted prefixes now that smith supports it directly.
Set v. 3.003 fonts as new test standard; change to version 3.004 in wscript for new work

khamti.commit_message: Partial fix of issue 9 graphite pwo tone ordering

master.commit_message: Bump version number. Set new fonts for testing standard.
Fix designspace axis mapping for interpolated weights
Prepare FONTLOG and other files for v 5.001 release
Change copyright years to include 2022
Add Graphite feature (cv09) for accessing uAA6C.alt for Tai Laing (tjl). Update documentation for cv09 and ss09. [This and previous commit fix issue #43.]
Add OpenType features (cv09 and ss09) for accessing uAA6C.alt for Tai Laing (tjl). Add OT tags for QIN and TJL
Make sha -u/uu tall
Fix typo for dflt lang tag
Bump version number. Set new fonts for testing standard.
OK, version number needs to be a string
Try to add the version number to the packages
Update release date to 18 June
Remove dev ver setting from NamKio and Deemawso packages; tweak Padauk-features doc
Add features.fea files from the previous commit
Fix u1020.med.thai attachment issue in OpenType
Fix some documentation
Bump to version 5.000 for release
Fix advance width bug in u1007.sml (from 500 > 0)
Substitute a small subjoined glyph (in place of med subjoined) attached to glyphs u1009, u100D and u1025
Some corrections and updates to documentation
Add deemawso and khamti font folders to the reference font folder to get regression tests working on the build
Update documentation and features.fea files; bump version number
Return to regression tests against version 4
Correct text for some feature cv05 tests and documentation [no build]
Split kern_1031 into 2 lookups so that all rules fire; add test for cv02
Update documentation and test files, especially done for feature cv06 but other changes also made.
OpenType features.fea added to the *.ufo folders
Add Graphite code for kerning vowel sign e (u1031) with consonants.
Remove TODO file
Update README for Github home page
Added feature UI strings for character variants
First attempt at kerning vowel sign e (u1031) with consonants. NB: New reference fonts it beta1 reference folder (only these kerning changes will show in regression tests).
Renamed "class103C" to "c103C_all" and moved it to classes.xml to be accessable to other files [nobuild]
Changes made to .ufo by the updated smith toolchain (VM reprovision, ./preflight)
Position u1037 (when attached to u103E) to the right of the tail of u101B (matches Graphite positioning)
Remove redundant lookup for small subjoined
Experimenting with the reference folder to see if I can get regression tests to build on the CI
Corrected LL attachment point on u1061
Rename 3 .aiph glyphs to .kham and fixes some Graphite variation selector rendering issues. [Refer to vs issues #15]
Fix Graphite issue with dotted circle between 1005 and 103B
Create release and beta reference folders for regression testing
Sorted out Graphite code (cv05) and OT code (cvo5, ss05) needed for Aiton and Phake; fixed Graphite code (cv06) and OT code (cv06, ss06) for 1086.kham
Change name of nbspace to uni00A0 to satisfy GoogleFonts recommendations
Remove the 105A rule from the altTail lookup
Removed MON and MNW language tags from cv04 causing issues with standard rendering
Backing out most of the changes for the 100A and 1014 alternates, raShort and raLong (mym2 ot lookups) that were made in March. [Not sure what I was thinking when I made those changes.]
Moved reference fonts to references folder in the root; cleaned up wscript
Updated README.txt [nobuild]
Updated example CSS and HTML; added examples of user-selectable features
Added APs to u102B and u1032 using "AA" as anchor name for some combinations of TallAA and AI(mark) for Mon. Fixes issue #37.
Fixed code so u106F and u107E get the tall form U described in issue #16 (it wasn't properly fixed the first time)
Enhance basics pattern tests
Fix Graphite reordering issue involving a subjoined ligature occuring before a prevowel - issue #36
Fix ss03. Add UI strings for ssxx features.
Added Asho Chin language to Graphite. Removed .csh suffix on 2 ligatures (they had no corresponding non-csh glyphs) and interfered with Graphite substitution.
Added new glyphs to glyph_data and tweaked sort order. Bumped version to 4.950 for testing before release.
Further work on cvxx and ssxx features, add code for old Graphite "hidden" features; update documentation and test files
Corrected @font-face (issue #13) [nobuild]
Enhanced character variant features for Khamti, Aiton and Phake
Dotted forms added to the FE00 list in lib.plist
Further refinement of the previous APs - issue #33
Adjust APs on u1075.kham, u1075.aiph and u107B for correct khamti positioning -  issue #33
Add ss0x for InDesign, Add cv06 for khamti dots
Correct another AP, remove tail on u105A in context of anything occurring below
Corrected APs on various Thai Mon glyphs
rename Thai Mon kinzi.glif to proper format; enhance testing for Thai Mon characters
Adjusted the AP "LL" on u1066.slanth [nobuild]
Fix lookups so aukmyit (u1037) positions to the left of any tail or lower diacritic for language "ksw"; also enabled cv02 and cv03 for "ksw"
Added to rule to include 100B with alternate tail [nobuild]
More tweaks to raShort lookup
More tweaks to raLong and raShort lookups
Update copyright dates and OFL_FAQ; correct CodePage range, correct head version
Fixed issues 34 and 35: adjusted design of quotedblbase and u1087.dot, u1089.dot and uAA7B.dot.
Add rendering engine test; fixed bug in "raShort" OpenType lookup
Make changes to sile tests
Split basics.sil (SILE) into separate Graphite and OpenType tests
Add Character Variant 05 to Graphite, Also add debug test RenderingUnknown
Fixed classes.xml
Fixed designs for AA6B.aiph, AA6B.med.aiph, AA6B.med.kham, AA77, and 107A.alt.aiph.
Add new glyphs to lists and did some cleanup in classes.xml
Added various .aiph glyphs including .med subjoined characters, adjusted design of 100B.med.thai and 100C.med.thai.
Account for "u1020.med.thai" in Graphite (there is no corresponding "u1020.med" for character variant substitution)
Renamed subjoined Thai glyphs(*.thai.med > *.med.thai) [nobuild]
Added .thai.med subjoined variants (Mon Thai)
colontriangularmod trouble again. This time I gave colontriangularmod.glif the properties of u02D0. I then deleted u02D0.glif. We'll see if that fixes this once and for all.
Made edits to some thai.med glyphs.
Added Sgaw slanth and slantr variants and Mon Thai subjoined variants to various classes
Completed issue 29: added Sgaw slanth and slantr variants. Added slots for issue 27, Mon Thai subjoined variants, edited 4 of the 9 characters. Updated metadata fields.
Fix the U+1066 U+1037 positioning - issue #29 - by adjusting "L" AP and adding "LL" AP.
Add sile test file to test issue #29
Added lookups for MonThai character variants (added cv01-cv04 to OpenType and cv04 for Graphite). Added sile test doc for character variants

REPEAT OFFENDER: Deleted new glyph colontriangularmod (Same as u02D0. Oddly, it kept Graphite compiler from giving a sort order for u02D0 from the padauk_classes.xml). Same issue on 9 May 2019 Commit: eb7c309ac571349494ff7ef3dcb63556df1c71de [eb7c309]
Added Thai variant glyphs to classes.xml.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:silnrsi/font-padauk
Add hidden feature ids
Adding remaining Mon Thai glyphs and adjusting spacing #27
Designing 5 more Mon Thai glyphs
Adding slots for Mon Thai variants; half now designed [nobuild]

Merge pull request #31 from pmverma/master

fix typo
fix typo
Add derived fonts to licenses
Update copyright to 2020
Bump version number. Set new fonts for testing standard.
Bump to version 4.000
Test run before release
Build WOFF metadata file
Update fontlog for release. Add OFL Reserved Font Names used in font packages.
Graphite support to account for reordered vowels and ligature u101B_u103B
Revert to previous ascender and descender values
Minor potential sequence fix in OT
OT and Graphite support for new ligature u101B_u103B
Added u101B_u103B ligature.
Correct version of Silf table and fix font weights
Add building Deemawso
Trying again with the rename to nbspace and also softhyphen
Implement fix for designspace issue
Fix ps_name issue with nbspace glyph; add reference fonts for tests; bump version number
Bump version number to separate changes from the released beta
Allow 1038 after 104B
Another factor of 2 saved on OT shaping with 10K space saving
Further 20% speedup in OT
Keep the speed and no shaping regressions
Speed up OT by a factor of 4
Tried to debug encoding issue on py3 CI.
Change version and update FONTLOG for beta release
Update documentation [nobuild]
Update Padauk features documentation [nobuild]
Changed ascender and descender values to satisfy various font validators
Deleted new glyph colontriangularmod (Same as u02D0. Oddly, it kept Graphite compiler from giving a sort order for u02D0 from the padauk_classes.xml)
Added outlines to u+2012, u+2027, and colontriangular mod.
Update documentation for new release [nobuild]
Rename some Latin and typesetting glyphs to comply with AGLFN
Fixed a few interpolation errors and updated kinzi diacritics.
Correct OS/2 UnicodeRanges for added character
Avoid medial clashes with 103B
Minor replacement fixes
Fixed more interpolation errors.
Made corrections to u1038.dot and u1088.dot
Simplify feature/lookup structure
Remove error dotted circles for csh. Fixes #8
Add glyph_data.csv and set public.glyphOrder and public.postscriptNames
add a few issue tests
Fix #18
Attachment point "LM" for u1060 - done previously on 11 Feb but somehow got "lost" (issue #16)
Rename u101F.sml to u101F.small since the former name caused issues. It's use (if necessary) will be sorted out later.
Change to use psfdeflang
Shift 103D with 1061 - done previously on 4 Feb but somehow got "lost" (issue #8)
Added attachment point "U" for u1014_u1010_u103C (issue #22)
Corrected @font-face (issue  #13)  [nobuild]
Add web folder with updated example HTLM and CSS [nobuild]
Finish up code and testing for .sml glyphs inside wrap (issue #4)
Add new glyphs to classes to get graphite build to work
Added four .sml glyphs, florin, caron, and ran script to correct path direction on all glyphs.
More AA70 fixes, sigh
Fix some OT AA70 reordering
Regularise version number
More AA70 fixes
Fixed compatibility issue.
Made edits to glyphs with uAA70, regular and bold.
Fix ai redup with high tones
Change Unicode encoding for Delta and Omega glyphs to meet our spec for recommended basic character set
Minor changes to UFOs to be compatible with updates in pysilfont (previous build failed)
Fix positionings of AA70
Fix 1037 1038 sequence problem in gr for blk_syllables:2950
Graphite - subjoined forms substituted with a smaller version to fit inside a wrap (issue #4)
fix a rule in 'decompose' lookup involving u103C reorder issue
Fixup APs in 1013 and 100E.med
1037 spacing improvements
Fixx uAA70 spacing problems
Re-inserted the trademark name string that was previously deleted. (Required by *psfmakewoffmetadata* script to update WOFF metadata XML)
Added Unicode Range bits for the new characters (issue #24)
Move 1002->101B in the UVS
Made design changes to AA70 and corresponding glyphs, adjusted APs
mv u1002.kham to u101B.kham

Fix 1037 1038 sequence problem in gr for blk_syllables:2950
Graphite - subjoined forms substituted with a smaller version to fit inside a wrap (issue #4)
fix a rule in 'decompose' lookup involving u103C reorder issue
Re-inserted the trademark name string that was previously deleted. (Required by *psfmakewoffmetadata* script to update WOFF metadata XML)
Added Unicode Range bits for the new characters (issue #24)
Made design changes to AA70 and corresponding glyphs, adjusted APs
Add UFO4 style UVS info, redup over cons in C U+1083 seq.
Sort out smarts for uAA70 positioning and spacing
Add new glyphs to classes to get build to work
Fixed space character names and metrics
Move a bunch of APs to something somewhat more sensible. Add first fontproof test
Made requested change to u1022. Added backround layers back in.
Continued work on general cleanup. Bumped metadata for copyright year, fixed RFN.
Make sure Khamti Book is adequately handled
Bump minor version since we now require khamti to use UVS
Add UVS to tests and rename Khamti font
Rename u1086.kham to u1086.dkham; KHT/N language doesn't use base khamti forms, use VS instead. Remove old build source files, at last.
Added 11 glyphs with the tag .sml, 40% smaller than the .med glyphs
Progress on cleaning up medium characters.
First pass at cleanup, harmonized stroke widths.
Added requested latin glyphs and symbols for multiscript texts (issue #6).
Add new glyphs to padauk_classes; add OpenType code and a test file for Asho Chin
Added 3 glyphs needed for Asho Chin (issue 8), raised vertical stem on 3 glyphs and shortened three other glyphs to address collision issues (issue 19).
Add the 4 new glyphs to padauk_classes to let the build finish (Graphite was stopping)  NB: Rules for Graphite and OpenType still need to be written for these
Added u103C.open.narr, u103C.open.wide, u103C.alt.open.narr, u103C.alt.open.wide to fix collisions in stacked shaping. (issue #4)
Add some tests for github issues
Merge to use UFO sources and workflow
Fixing anchor position in UFO to match what's in fea
Fixing the position of one anchor in fea to match what's in the UFO
Adding capHeight and xHeight back in after restore; version bump to 3.902
Fix lookup ordering for double vs single attachment
Adding xHeight and capHeight; version bump to 3.901
Removing ufos and designspace that are no longer needed
Changing designspace and preflights to use new masters
Rescaling two main masters from 1024 to 2048
Restoring advance widths removed in error
Auto conform BookBold APs to same structure as Regular
First test change to fix interpolation compatibility
First Glyphs import/export; mainly sorting anchors
Creating interim designspace and preflights for interpolated version
Preparing lib.plist for use with Glyphs
Get something work OKish. More refinement needed

Set up new designspace workflow: modified wscript, renamed PadaukBook .fea files to make it work. *NB:* Designspace file not set up for interpolation yet. Design work needs to be done before that will work (too many fatal errors). Also renamed uniFE00 to uFE00 in Regular for consistency.
Moved ufos to /masters folder and fixed up metadata, added preflight to normalize and sync
Added parameters to prevent grcompiler output for multiple weights to be overwritten.
Transfer in adjustment APs. Builds with no functional difference
Fix order classes so not needed at the glyph level
Initial UFO export, missing AP stuff still
Rearrange folder structure to conform to standard for new workflow
Fix no breaks in contextual rule runs
Modified Graphite and OpenType so Sgaw Karen defaults to round washwe and upright hato (issue #11)
Adjusted prefixes now that smith supports it directly.
Set v. 3.003 fonts as new test standard; change to version 3.004 in wscript for new work

It builds, but is junk

Set up new designspace workflow: modified wscript, renamed PadaukBook .fea files to make it work. *NB:* Designspace file not set up for interpolation yet. Design work needs to be done before that will work (too many fatal errors). Also renamed uniFE00 to uFE00 in Regular for consistency.
Moved ufos to /masters folder and fixed up metadata, added preflight to normalize and sync
Add project dirs to .gitignore
Transfer in adjustment APs. Builds with no functional difference
Merge branch 'preufo' into toufo
Change special values to APs

Initial UFO export, missing AP stuff still
Rearrange folder structure to conform to standard for new workflow
Fix no breaks in contextual rule runs
Mark for old make_fea
Now builds using fonttools
Keep using fontforge
Added the buildusingfontforge param.
replaced OFL-FAQ.txt with latest version (1.1-update5)

Adjusted prefixes now that smith supports it directly.
Set v. 3.003 fonts as new test standard; change to version 3.004 in wscript for new work
